liasd.asadera.model

Class AbstractModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • liasd.asadera.model.AbstractModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SummarizeModel

    public abstract class AbstractModel
extends java.util.Observable
    Represent an automatic summarizatin system split in 3 steps : - preProcess : list of preProcessing computation - process : list of processing computation for summary's generation - postProcess : list of postProcess
    Author:
    valnyz

      • getProcessOption

        public java.lang.String getProcessOption(int processId,
                                         java.lang.String optionName)
                                  throws liasd.asadera.exception.LacksOfFeatures
        Get value of a process parameter (option) as a String. Be sure to know the type of the parameter when using this.
        Parameters:
        int - processId, id of parameter's process
        String - optionName, parameter's name as write in config file
        Returns:
        String value, the parameter's value, may need a cast.
        Throws:
        liasd.asadera.exception.LacksOfFeatures - if the parameter's name is not in the parameter's map of the process. i.e. has not be seen in config file.

      • setProcessOption

        public void setProcessOption(java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> processOption)
        Set the process option lists. You shouldn't use this method unless you override the AbstractController.notifyProcessOptionChanged(Map)
        Parameters:
        String - processOption

      • setMultiThreading

        public void setMultiThreading(boolean multiThreading)
        Specify if the tool must be used with multithreading. Multithreading is implemented as one thread per corpus from the multicorpus. If your multicorpus has only one corpus, it is useless.
        Parameters:
        boolean - multiThreading

      • isMultiThreading

        public boolean isMultiThreading()
        Test if the tool must be used with multithreading. Multithreading is implemented as one thread per Corpus from the Multicorpus. If your multicorpus has only one corpus, it is useless.
        Parameters:
        boolean - multiThreading

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear instance's attribute. Useful especially for genetic algorithm.
